value.title: Careful With That Axe, Sales Team: AI And The Future Of Forecasting
value.excerpt: Opinion-based forecasts have low predictability and accuracy, are prone to bias and manipulation and yield limited value to the B2B organizations that adopt them. Fortunately, artificial intelligence is infusing and enhancing B2B sales forecasting.

value.title: Machine learning can identify cancerous cells by their acidity
value.excerpt: Cancerous cells exhibit several key differences from healthy cells that help identify them as dangerous. For instance, the pH—the level of acidity—within a cancerous cell is not the same as the pH within a healthy cell.

value.title: How Can You Go Global As A Startup?
value.excerpt: At an early stage of this business back in 2009, in the peak of the recession, I had the urge to go global and diversify, making my business less dependent on the U.S. economy. I did some research and learned that Mexico was investing heavily in tourism and bringing many international conferences to the country.
